stories.title: Brook's Law: “adding manpower to a late software project makes it later”
They Had the Vaccines and a Plan to Reopen. Instead They Got Cold Feet

stories.text:
Hi! I am building a personal finance app rethinking what being 'smart' about money means from first principle. Sometimes it feels that 'saving' is not a lindy framework to think about your finances given current investment opportunity climate. I do realize that the notions of 'investing' and 'saving' are not contradictory, however the lessons of 'rich dad poor dad' book are loosing their relevancy.

TO tie this back to the title, I am trying to formulate the 'end' to which 'budgeting' is a mean. To then search for a solution that requires far less attention and effort than budgeting.
stories.title: What Is the Purpose of Budgeting?
